LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.label: Fundamental Capability
LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.description: A basic capability usually considered extremely common or compulsory - such as speaking or walking.

LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.label: Advanced Capability
LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.description: A complex or unusual capability, ususally something you are able to do rather than something you know.

LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.label: Programming
LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.description: Programming concepts ranging from early mechanical computing, all the way to scifi artificial intelligence.

LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.label: Fabrication
LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.description: Use of tools, machines, and related abilities to fabricate items, clothing, or other small scale things.

LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.label: Construction
LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.description: Construction of large scale structures, objects, buildings, and vehicles.

LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.label: Tailoring
LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.description: Proficiencies dealing with thread, cloth, leather, and general cloth-work.

LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.label: Carpentry
LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.description: Proficiencies dealing wood, carving, assembly, etc.

LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.label: Masonry
LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.description: Proficiencies dealing stonework, stone carving, statues, masonry, etc.

LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.label: Engineering
LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.description: Most applied science proficiencies that do not directly involve construction or crafting.

LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.label: Physics
LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.description: Proficiencies that primarily fall under physics.

LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.label: Chemistry
LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.description: Proficiencies that primarily fall under chemistry.

LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.label: Geology
LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.description: Proficiencies that primarily fall under geology or planetary sciences in general.

LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.label: Biology
LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.description: Proficiencies that primarily fall under biology or life sciences in general.

LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.label: Astronomy
LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.description: Proficiencies that primarily fall under astronomy.

LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.label: Mathematics
LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.description: Proficiencies focused on math or other pure logic.

LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.label: General Knowledge
LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.description: Something you know, often theoretical or not immediately applicable. History, sciences, etc.
